stork.scheduler

Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.scheduler.Job

  • public abstract class Job
extends Object
    A transfer job.

    • Method Detail

      • user

        public abstract User user()
        The User this Job belongs to.

      • status

        public JobStatus status()
        Sets the status of the job, updates ad, and adjusts state according to the status. This can also be used to set a message.

      • status

        public Job status(JobStatus s)

      • status

        public Job status(String msg)

        public void jobId(int id)
        Set the job id.

      • remove

        public void remove(String reason)
        Called when the job gets removed from the queue.

      • reschedule

        public void reschedule()
        This will increment the attempts counter, and set the status back to scheduled. It does not actually put the job back into the scheduler queue.

      • shouldReschedule

        public boolean shouldReschedule()
        Check if the job should be rescheduled.

      • isTerminated

        public boolean isTerminated()
        Return whether or not the job has terminated.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the transfer between the specified resources.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
